overview:
Boris Wasmuth (Managing Director Marketing and Co-Founder)

Boris Wasmuth (40) is responsible for Marketing at GameDuell. In 1999, he has founded dooyoo.com, one of Europe’s leading consumer sites and, along with his team, was awarded the OnlineStar - the most prestigious German Internet award. Prior to founding GameDuell, Boris worked for BMW, Henkel, and Bertelsmann. He was invited as a speaker to the most important Internetevents such as the Digital Lifestyle Day (DLD) and is a co-author of the book “Gabler’s Handbook of Electronic Business”.

Boris Wasmuth grew up in Cologne and Los Angeles. He graduated honors from the University of Cologne with a Masters in Business Administration and is a graduate of the “American Management Seminars”.

“I enjoy the healthy mixture of an energetic startup with a casual and personal atmosphere in our team. At GameDuell I’m given the opportunity to work closely and intensively with the best people. And there’s always something to laugh about. â€˜Let my playing be my learning, and my learning be my playing.â€™ Fun at my workplace and professional success are tightly related for me.”
